players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is acting suspiciously. He didn't say much in the discussion and we don't know him."

You: "Based on the information we have, it seems that one of us is the mafia. Let's try to identify any inconsistencies or suspicious behavior during our discussions. I personally find Charlie's reluctance to participate in the discussion and his comment about being..."

Charlie: "I think it's important for us to work together and share any information we have that could help us identify the mafia among us. I noticed that Charlie seemed hesitant during our last discussion, but I also want to give him the benefit of the doubt..."
